short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will notify you when LIRIK changes games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fan made little extension. All the rights to the images goes to their authors.

Do you love to watch Lirik's stream?
Do you love to watch him playing RP games, but never know when he stream those?

Now you can be notified every time Lirik's changes game. Get a notification from your browser just like a facebook message and see what game is Lirik now playing.
